name: Gorthok the Thunder Boar
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
text: If Gorthok takes 27 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Gorthok makes two melee attacks: one with its lightning tusks and one with its thunder hooves.

action.name: Lightning Tusks
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) lightning damage.

action.name: Thunder Hooves
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) thunder damage.

action.name: Lightning Bolt (Recharge 6)
text: Gorthok shoots a bolt of lightning at one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

description:
Gorthok is a primal nature spirit that takes the form of a boar as big as an elephant, with lightning that dances along its tusks. Gorthok serves the will of Talos, god of storms, and can be summoned during stormy weather to do the bidding of Talos's evil followers. Like its patron deity, Gorthok revels in destruction.
Source: Essentials Kit: Dragon of Icespire Peak p. 58
